# Practical 7 code instructions
## Make directory and create file
mkdir practical07
nano prac7.c
nano prac7_1.c


## Compile

gcc -o p7 prac7.c -lm
gcc -o p7_1 prac7_1.c -lm
## Execute

./p7
./p7_1
